alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 15 at 9:37AM CDT until April 16 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lake Charles LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Louisiana... Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage. * WHEN...From this evening to tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Minor flooding of Heymann Park off of Highway 90 will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 9.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 10.0 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Vermilion River Lafayette, Surrey Street Gag 10.0 9.9 Sat 9 am CDT 10.0 9.7 9.5 &&
